messages.title: Why I'm backing Antoine
messages.content: After the expenses scandal, Hexham badly needs a fresh start with a new MP. I'm voting for Antoine because he's a hard-working, honest person who will serve this constituency well.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Making sure everyone gets a fair crack of the whip, and making sure everyone plays by the rules - rights and responsibilities must go hand in hand.
Addressing the poverty issue in the UK, focusing on pensioners, low wage earners, and single-parent families.
Investing in the country's future through a world-class education system for toddlers through to adults engaged in life-long learning.

mentions.candidate: I'm asking you to vote Labour to protect what we've achieved in the last 13 years.
mentions.tacticalSituation: The constituency has a straight fight between Labour and the Conservatives (the Lib Dems have come third in every election since 1992).

issues.education: The future of this country lies in exploiting the rich talent of its people. To ensure a prosperous future, we need a world-class education system.
issues.health: I'm asking you to vote Labour to protect the national minimum wage, billions more invested in the NHS and education, shorter waiting times, free prescriptions, reduced patient charges, tax credits, the winter fuel allowance, free TV licenses for the over 75s, and cracking down on Anti-Social Behaviour.

endorsements.endorsement: After the expenses scandal, Hexham badly needs a fresh start with a new MP. I'm voting for Antoine because he's a hard-working, honest person who will serve this constituency well.

images.caption: Antoine Tinnion with constituents and meeting David Miliband MP

leaflet.additionalNotes: My pledges to you include honesty and integrity, representing the interests of local residents above everything else, value for money, keeping in touch by holding regular meetings, and keeping expense claims to the bare minimum.
